Keywords: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
Headline: Patterns left in the sand by the retreating tide at Whiteford Sands on the Gower Peninsula, Wales.
Title: Maritime Motif
CaptionAbstract:
I loved the patterns left on the beach at Whiteford Sands on the Gower Peninsula. Although the patterns repeated over quite large areas, every so often the pattern would change to something distinctly different, as if the sea had got bored of doing the same thing over and over again and decided to move on to something new.

This particular pattern looks a bit like tyre tracks, but is completely naturally formed.
